name: SledFree:D
description:
The sequel to 2016's SledFree2, SledFree:D furthers the series from a new perspective. The aim of the game remains avoiding obstacles while you speed your sled downhill and all of the radical game modes return from SledFree2, with exciting new takes.

- Game Modes -
Sled Free
Travel down an endless slope scoring points as you go. Extra points are awarded for air time and tight manoeuvres.

Slalom
Race through every flag as you try and reach the bottom as fast as possible.

Race
Reach the finish line ahead of your opponents.

Run!!!
See how long you can outrun the deadly snow boulder.

- Basic Controls -
Left and Right arrow keys - Steer
Z Key - Go faster
X Key - Slow down
C Key - Look Behind
